description: Demolition of existing conservatory and erection of a single storey side/rear extension.
decision_conditions: Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any Order revoking or re-enacting this Order) no windows or other openings (other than those hereby approved) shall be formed in the flank walls of the building hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To protect the amenities and privacy of the occupiers of the adjoining residential properties in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that the Planning Condition 8 (Landscaping Scheme) of planning permission 19/01811/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
305A Existing Site Plan306A Proposed Site PlanBoth of these drawings are invalid as red outline of entire site must be clearly shown. Please correct and re-submit
